Headline: Kim Jong Un admits North Korea is facing 'tense food situation' - CNN
Text: By Yoonjung Seo, Gawon Bae and Ivana Kottasov√°, CNNUpdated 1710 GMT (0110 HKT) June 17, 2021 Seoul (CNN)North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has admitted his country is facing food shortages that he blamed on last year's typhoon and floods, just months after he warned North Koreans about a looming potential crisis.
